title: See massive waves wipe out wedding in Hawaii
description: Massive waves crashed a wedding and sent guests running for cover in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii.

title: Top US general orders comprehensive review of US-China military interactions
description: The most senior US general has ordered a comprehensive review of US military interactions with Chinese forces over the last five years as concerns about Beijing's assertive behavior in the Indo-Pacific region increases, according to three defense officials.

title: 'Captain America can't lift an iPhone?': Chris Evans thinks his iPhone 12 is too heavy
description: "Captain America" star Chris Evans says he misses his iPhone 6s, the 2014 model that he held onto until this year. He explains to Collider's Steven Weintraub why he thinks his new iPhone 12 is too heavy.

title: High temperatures caused section of UK airport's runway 'to lift'
description: One of the United Kingdom's largest airports suspended flights on Monday after high temperatures damaged a runway. Temperatures soared up to 37 degrees Celsius (about 99 degrees Fahrenheit) in some parts of the country.

title: Reality Check: How the 'politics of gamesmanship' chipped away at China bill
description: The Senate is gearing up to take action on a bill to pump billions of dollars into American manufacturing and scientific research, but will lawmakers be able to reach a consensus only days before they head home for their August recess? John Avlon has a Reality Check.

title: How this 10-year-old checkers champ is helping the Ukrainian army
description: CNN's Alex Marquardt meets Valeria Yezhova, a 10-year-old Ukrainian girl who's using her skills as the world checkers champion in her age group to fundraise for the Ukrainian army.

title: Zelensky fires top officials over staffers' 'collaboration' with Russia
3 people killed and 2 injured during a shooting at an Indiana shopping mall
description: Three people are dead and two others hospitalized after a shooter opened fire in the food court of a Greenwood, Indiana, shopping mall Sunday evening, police say.

title: Why did Ohio abortion story spin so out of control?
description: Nicole Carroll describes how the Columbus Dispatch confirmed a child rape allegation that some conservative media outlets disbelieved. Natasha Alford and Bill Carter analyze the partisan media battles over abortion.

title: It's official, Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck are married
description: Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck have officially tied the knot, a source close to Lopez tells CNN.

title: Law enforcement analyst: Arredondo 'begging and pleading' with Uvalde shooter
description: Retired LAPD Sgt. Cheryl Dorsey reacts to recently released bodycam footage featuring Uvalde school district police chief Pedro "Pete" Arredondo attempting to negotiate with the gunman inside Robb Elementary School.

title: India hits 2 billion Covid-19 vaccinations as infections hit four-month high
description: The Indian government's Covid-19 vaccinations hit 2 billion on Sunday, with booster doses underway for all adults, as daily infections hit a four-month high, official data showed.

title: Zelensky fires top officials over staffers' 'collaboration' with Russia
description: • Bloody battle for control rages in eastern Ukraine as Russia struggles to gain ground in Donetsk

title: Inside Steve Bannon's plan to reshape the Republican Party
description: Steve Bannon, President Trump's former adviser, is pushing to install election workers that believe the 2020 election was stolen. For more, see CNN's special report, "Power in Chaos: How Steve Bannon is disrupting democracy".

title: A West Virginia woman woke up from two-year coma -- and identified her brother as the attacker who nearly killed her, police say
description: A West Virginia woman has awoken from a two-year coma and identified her brother as her attacker, according to police.

title: China once saw Europe as a counter to US power. Now ties are at an abysmal low
description: When Chinese leader Xi Jinping made his first state visit to Europe in 2014, he set out to herald a new era of cooperation in a multi-country tour, which the European Parliament President at the time called "a welcome signal of the importance that the new Chinese leader attaches to a strengthened EU-China partnership."

title: Uvalde shooting report describes multiple failures and a 'lackadaisical approach' by law enforcement
